Token.Abstract: A few tools for creating rounded rectangle paths and managing corner radii.
Returns a corner radius sized appropriately for the given rectangle.

Parameter.Name: rect
Parameter.Abstract: The rectangle for which a corner radius is desired.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A corner radius that should look good when used with rect. (Or, since "good" is subjective, a corner radius that shouldn't look ridiculous when used with rect.)

Token.Abstract: Returns a corner radius that approximates the curvature of the corner radius supplied for the given rectangle when that rectangle is inset by the specified amount.

Parameter.Name: rect
Parameter.Abstract: The rectangle to be adjusted by inset.

Parameter.Name: inset
Parameter.Abstract: The number of points each edge of rect will be inset to create the rectangle used for calculating the returned corner radius. The width and height dimensions of rect are each reduced by 2 ✕ inset; a positive inset results in a rectangle smaller than rect, while a negative inset results in a larger rectangle.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A corner radius for the adjusted rectangle.

Token.Abstract: Returns a corner radius for a rectangle that approximates the curvature of a corner radius used for a rectangle of a different size.

Parameter.Name: fromRect
Parameter.Abstract: The rectangle that uses the corner radius radius.

Parameter.Name: toRect
Parameter.Abstract: The rectangle for which the corner radius will be returned.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A corner radius for toRect that approximates the curvature of the corner arc resulting from using radius with fromRect.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new path for a rounded rectangle. The path will be adjusted to ensure that on non-Retina displays, subpixel rendering will not occur.

Parameter.Name: rect
Parameter.Abstract: The rectangle for which a rounded rectangle path is desired.

Parameter.Name: radius
Parameter.Abstract: The corner radius to be used by the returned path.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new CGPathRef usable for drawing the rounded rectangle path.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new path for a rounded rectangle. The rectangle is adjusted to ensure that the stroke falls entirely within the bounds of the path, and that odd stroke widths do not result in subpixel rendering on non-Retina displays.

Parameter.Name: rect
Parameter.Abstract: The rectangle for which a rounded rectangle path is desired.

Parameter.Name: radius
Parameter.Abstract: The corner radius to be used by the returned path.

Parameter.Name: width
Parameter.Abstract: The stroke width that will be used when drawing the returned path.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new CGPathRef usable for drawing the rounded rectangle path.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new path for a rounded rectangle. The rectangle is adjusted by the specified inset, but is not otherwise adjusted to account for stroke widths or subpixel rendering on non-Retina displays.

Parameter.Name: rect
Parameter.Abstract: The rectangle for which a rounded rectangle path is desired.

Parameter.Name: radius
Parameter.Abstract: The corner radius to be used by the returned path.

Parameter.Name: inset
Parameter.Abstract: The number of points each edge of rect will be inset to create the rounded rectangle path. The width and height dimensions of rect are each reduced by 2 ✕ inset; a positive inset results in a rectangle smaller than rect, while a negative inset results in a larger rectangle.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new CGPathRef usable for drawing the rounded rectangle path.
